tag_list: international-business, digital-marketing, web-strategy, web-analytics, product-branding, copywriting, web-content-management, search-engine-optimization, market-research, communications, social-media, government-liaison, event-management, journalism, adv
overview:
Born in Asia, currently living in Europe for nearly 15 years, and educated in both places, Sheila has over 10 years of professional experience in international business, digital marketing, product branding, and web content management.

She has also worked as a consultant for government agencies both in Asia and Europe. As a student and young professional in the ASEAN-Japan Friendship Program for the 21st Century, she was active in leadership initiatives, event management, and government liaisons.

With a BA in Journalism, Sheila earlier worked in advertising and science and technology journalism and is a member of the European Journalists Network and the UM (Finnish Foreign Ministry) Press Center.

Sheila’s interest includes organizational development, new media, strategic planning, professional networking, enterpreneurship, creative arts and culture management, eLearning, and eCommerce. Her current work focus includes Digital Content, Brand Building, Online Marketing, Web Strategy, B2B, and SMEs.
